title: Wanda Maximoff Deserves Better From the MCU
content: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness erased the Scarlet Witch's growth in *WandaVision—*and retread a lot of the comic books' missteps.
description: ‘Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness’ erased the Scarlet Witch's growth in ‘WandaVision’—and retread a lot of the comic books’ missteps.
